EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Website_Omni-channelRetailE-Book_Q114.Nurture #3: Responsive Design Present
EmailTemplate.subject: Driving Conversions with Mobile Apps: Following up on the Omnichannel eBook You Downloaded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You already know that your customers expect a seamless shopping experience across in-store, web and mobile channels. Find out how other leading retailers are using responsive design to meet these expectations.
Access the presentation here <http://www.slideshare.net/PivotalLabs/responsive-mobile-the-next-phase-of-retail-30806786>.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
